de.bioforscher.singa.simulation.model.graphs

Interface ConcentrationContainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MembraneContainer, MultiConcentrationContainer, SimpleConcentrationContainer

    public interface ConcentrationContainer
    Concentration containers are used to manage the concentration inside of a node. Modules may require the node to restrict the availability of a concentration to certain compartments. On the border between two compartments the availability of a chemical entity can be different depending on the compartment of the neighbouring node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns all ChemicalEntities that are referenced in this container.
      java.util.Set<CellSection> getAllReferencedSections()
      Returns all Compartments that are referenced in this container.

      Returns the available concentration based on the given compartment.

    • Method Detail

      • getConcentration

        javax.measure.Quantity<MolarConcentration> getConcentration(ChemicalEntity chemicalEntity)
        Returns the representative concentration of a chemical entity. If the concentration is available differently for multiple compartments the average concentration is returned.
        Parameters:
        chemicalEntity - The ChemicalEntity.
        Returns:
        The concentration.

      • getAvailableConcentration

        javax.measure.Quantity<MolarConcentration> getAvailableConcentration(CellSection cellSection,
                                                                     ChemicalEntity chemicalEntity)
        Returns the available concentration based on the given compartment.
        Parameters:
        cellSection - The identifier of the compartment.
        chemicalEntity - The ChemicalEntity.
        Returns:
        The concentration.

      • setConcentration

        void setConcentration(ChemicalEntity chemicalEntity,
                      javax.measure.Quantity<MolarConcentration> concentration)
        Sets the representative concentration of a chemical entity. This resets the available concentrations for all registered compartments.
        Parameters:
        chemicalEntity - The ChemicalEntity.
        concentration - The concentration.

      • setAvailableConcentration

        Sets the available concentration based on the given compartment.
        Parameters:

        chemicalEntity - The ChemicalEntity.
        concentration - The concentration.
